creator: poi-support@buni.org
text:
Avik Sengupta and Libin Roman are both becomming active contributers to the POI
project.  They should be recognized as so.  Please attach a patch for the
jakarta-poi/src/documentation/xdocs/who.xml file noting your developer status
with your name/email and link to your personal page if you have one as you wish
it to appear.  (recommend you obfuscate your email unless you like receiving
emails promising you $5mil if you fax your personal information to someone in
South Africa). - Thanx.
Well I guess libin decided not to add himself.  Avik is now a committer.
creator: poi-support@buni.org
